name: ZitroneGame
description:
1.1 is now avible, there are Bug fixes and changes. 

-  removed the Apple ( sommething did't work / it stopped wehn you jummped on it.)

- bug fix on the end  (there was a bug at the end)

- changed the end (weh the level was compited)

- Added more Pineapples

- removed a Gamecrashed Bug  (wehn you jupmped one of the triangels there was a gamecrash)

I hope there are no more Bugs and similar things, i will add the Apple again wehn its working.

good Luck
